data.sentence: The word مِنْ comes from the root م ن and is associated with the meanings: From

data.meanings: To heat, become hot or very hot, melt. Boiling water. Loyal/close friend/relative. Black smoke.
data.sentence: The word حَمِيمٍ comes from the root ح م م and is associated with the meanings: To heat, become hot or very hot, melt. Boiling water. Loyal/close friend/relative. Black smoke.

data.meanings: to descend, come down, go down, happen, alight at, settle in a place, lodge. anzala - to send down, give. nazulun - that which is prepared for a guest's entertainment, abode, gift. manzil - mansion, station. nazzala - to cause to descend, send down. tanziil - sending down, divine revelation, orderly arrangement and authentic compilation, gradual revelation.
data.sentence: The word فَنُزُلٌ comes from the root ن ز ل and is associated with the meanings: to descend, come down, go down, happen, alight at, settle in a place, lodge. anzala - to send down, give. nazulun - that which is prepared for a guest's entertainment, abode, gift. manzil - mansion, station. nazzala - to cause to descend, send down. tanziil - sending down, divine revelation, orderly arrangement and authentic compilation, gradual revelation.
